sentences.en: Empowering the underprivileged lies in assuring them that education holds the real source of power.
sentences.cn: 帮助贫困人民就要让他们相信教育是真正的力量源泉。

sentences.en: He provides affordable housing for the underprivileged.
sentences.cn: 他提供给穷困阶层一所供得起的房子.

sentences.en: He said it was the job of the Church to speak for the underprivileged.
sentences.cn: 他说，为贫困群体说话是教会的义务。

sentences.en: His doughty campaigns for the underprivileged have earned him national respect.
sentences.cn: 他为弱势群体奔走呼号，赢得了全国的尊敬。

sentences.en: People born or grown in underprivileged circumstances can be privileged in terms of other things.
sentences.cn: 生于或长于不利环境的人可能在其它方面具有优势.

sentences.en: Please list out the target group e . g. underprivileged group such as non - engaged youth, single parents, etc.
sentences.cn: 请列明雇用的目标对象类别,例如:双失青少年 、 单亲妇女等弱势社羣.

sentences.en: Proceeds from the shows paid for scholarships for underprivileged students and treatment for autistic children.
sentences.cn: 演出的收入则作为清寒奖学金以及自闭儿童的医疗费.

sentences.en: The Shillong Chamber Choir also has a little home school for the underprivileged children.
sentences.cn: 西隆合唱团还为穷苦人家的儿童修建了一所小小的家庭学校.
贫困者需要特殊的帮助.

sentences.en: They are children from underprivileged homes.
sentences.cn: 他们是出身于贫苦人家的孩子们.

sentences.en: To help underprivileged Scots go to college.
sentences.cn: 来帮助贫困的苏格兰青年上大学.

sentences.en: To the underprivileged group, it is almost just a dream to have the own house.
sentences.cn: 对于贫困阶层来说, 拥有自己的房子几乎只能成为梦想了.

sentences.en: You should not be contemptuous of underprivileged people.
sentences.cn: 你不应该看不起无权无势的人.

words.tran_cn: 贫困的；被剥夺基本权力的；社会地位低下的

trans.tran_cn: 被剥夺基本权力的，穷困的，下层社会的
trans.tran_en: very poor, with worse living conditions, educational opportunities etc than most people in society
